as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild

asChild.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
Read our Composition guide for more details.
asChild.description_zh:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
Read our Composition guide for more details.

hitAreaMargins.description: Allow this much margin when determining resizable handle hit detection
hitAreaMargins.description_zh: Allow this much margin when determining resizable handle hit detection

id.description: Resize handle id (unique within group); falls back to useId when not provided
id.description_zh: Resize handle id (unique within group); falls back to useId when not provided

events.name: dragging
events.description: Event handler called when dragging the handler.
events.description_zh: Event handler called when dragging the handler.
